keyEvents.title: Arrival at Cricket's Home
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats arrive at Cricket's house where they find Masira and Shoujou caring for the collapsed Cricket.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the base of operations for the alliance between the Straw Hats and Saruyama Alliance.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Noland's Logbook
keyEvents.description: Cricket shows the crew Noland's ancient logbook containing evidence of Sky Island's existence.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial proof that validates the crew's journey to Sky Island.

keyEvents.title: Alliance Formed
keyEvents.description: Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island from his house.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the crucial alliance is formed that enables the Sky Island journey.

description: A house on the coast of Jaya Island where Mont Blanc Cricket lives. The house is filled with salvaged items from Cricket's diving expeditions and serves as the headquarters for the Saruyama Alliance.
culturalSignificance: Represents Cricket's dedication to his mission, as the house is surrounded by artifacts from his years of searching for proof of the city of gold.

statusHistory.description: Functioning as Cricket's home and the Saruyama Alliance headquarters

keyEvents.title: Noland's Execution
keyEvents.description: Mont Blanc Noland was executed in the Lvneel Kingdom 400 years ago for allegedly lying about the city of gold.
keyEvents.significance: The historical event that created the legend of 'Noland the Liar' and shaped Cricket's life mission.

description: A kingdom in the North Blue that was the home of Mont Blanc Noland. This is where Noland was executed 400 years ago after the king found no gold on Jaya Island.
culturalSignificance: The kingdom where the legend of 'Noland the Liar' originated, affecting the Mont Blanc family's reputation for generations.

statusHistory.description: Mentioned as a historical location from 400 years in the past

keyEvents.title: Cricket Emerges from Diving
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats first encounter Cricket when he surfaces from a diving expedition at the Jaya coast.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats meet their crucial ally for reaching Sky Island.

description: The coastal area of Jaya Island where Mont Blanc Cricket conducts his diving expeditions searching for evidence of the sunken city of gold.
culturalSignificance: The area where Cricket has spent years diving to prove his ancestor's story, representing his dedication and perseverance.

statusHistory.description: Active diving location for Cricket's search
